question: How do I register an account?
answer: Click Sign Up, enter your email, create a strong password and follow the on-screen steps. Verify your email to complete registration.

question: I didn't receive the verification email — what do I do?
answer: Check your spam/junk folder, ensure your email was entered correctly, and request a new verification email. If still not received, contact support with the email address used.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Use the 'Forgot password' link on the login page. Enter your registered email; you'll receive a reset link. Follow the link to set a new password.

question: How can I change my date of birth or personal details?
answer: For sensitive data like DOB or legal name we require ID verification. Submit a support ticket with proof (ID document) and request the change; our team processes it after verification.

question: How do I deposit funds into my account?
answer: Go to the Cashier/Deposit section, choose a payment method (card, e-wallet, bank), enter the amount and follow the payment provider's steps. Deposits are usually instant.

question: I made a deposit but it doesn't show — what now?
answer: Check transaction status with your payment provider and refresh your account. If pending after 15–30 minutes, open a support ticket with the transaction ID and deposit receipt.

question: How do I withdraw my winnings?
answer: Go to Cashier → Withdraw. Choose a verified payment method and enter the amount. Withdrawals follow our KYC and AML checks and processing times vary by method.

question: Why is my withdrawal pending or on hold?
answer: Pending withdrawals can be due to pending KYC verification, manual review, or payment provider checks. Provide required documents for verification to speed up processing.

question: What documents do I need to verify my account (KYC)?
answer: Typically a government ID (passport/ID card/driver's license) and a proof of address (utility bill or bank statement under 3 months). Ensure documents are clear and fully visible.

question: How long does verification (KYC) take?
answer: Automatic checks can be instant; manual review may take 24–72 hours. Complex cases or missing documents can take longer.

question: What file formats and sizes are accepted for verification documents?
answer: We accept JPG, PNG, PDF. Max file size usually 5–10 MB. Make sure the image is clear and all corners of the document are visible.

question: Can I change my registered email?
answer: Changing email usually requires verification. Open a support ticket asking to change your email and be prepared to verify ownership of the old and new email addresses.

question: Can I change my username?
answer: Usernames are subject to availability and platform policy. Some platforms allow changes via account settings; others require support assistance.

question: How do I update my payment method?
answer: In Cashier → Payment Methods, add a new method. For security, some platforms require a small verification deposit or re-verification of documents before enabling withdrawals to a new method.

question: What are wagering (playthrough) requirements for bonuses?
answer: Wagering (rollover) means you must bet the bonus (and sometimes deposit) amount a set number of times before withdrawal (e.g., 30x the bonus). Check the bonus T&Cs for exact numbers.

question: How do I claim a bonus or promo code?
answer: Go to Promotions/Bonuses page, choose the offer and follow the claim instructions (enter code at deposit or click to activate). Read the T&Cs to confirm eligibility.

question: Why isn't my bonus credited?
answer: Check eligibility, deposit method, minimum deposit amount, and whether the promo code was applied correctly. If all conditions met, contact support with relevant screenshots.

question: Can I use more than one bonus at a time?
answer: Most platforms restrict using multiple bonuses simultaneously. Read the bonus terms which specify stacking rules.

question: How do wagering contributions work?
answer: Different games contribute different percentages to wagering. For example slots may contribute 100%, while table games 10% or 0% depending on the policy.

question: My game crashed and I lost my bet — what should I do?
answer: If a crash occurred during a bet, take screenshots/record the time and round ID, then open a ticket. The support team will investigate logs and may refund or void the stake if necessary.

question: Why was my bet voided or canceled?
answer: Bets can be voided due to technical errors, incorrect odds, or rule violations. Support can explain the cause and review the case.

question: How do I update my currency or display currency?
answer: Currency is often chosen at registration and may be changeable only by support. Contact support to request a currency change and be aware of conversion and bonus implications.

question: What are deposit and withdrawal limits?
answer: Limits vary by payment method and account tier. Check Cashier or Account Limits for daily/weekly/monthly caps, or contact support to request temporary/ permanent limit changes.

question: How long do withdrawals take?
answer: Processing times: e-wallets 0–24h, cards 1–5 business days, bank transfers 2–7 business days. Verification and manual review can add time.

question: Is my personal data safe?
answer: Yes — the platform uses industry-standard encryption and adheres to privacy regulations. See the Privacy Policy for specifics about storage and processing.

question: Do I need to pay taxes on winnings?
answer: Tax rules vary by country. In some jurisdictions winnings are tax-free for players; in others you must declare them. Consult a tax advisor for specific guidance.

question: Can I have multiple accounts?
answer: Multiple accounts are usually prohibited. Having more than one account can lead to account suspension and forfeiture of funds. Contact support if you need to merge accounts or have legitimate reasons.

question: How do I close or self-exclude my account?
answer: Account closure and self-exclusion options are in responsible gaming settings. Contact support to request account closure or set exclusion periods; provide ID for verification.

question: How do I set deposit or loss limits?
answer: In Responsible Gaming or Account Limits, set daily/weekly/monthly deposit or loss limits. Contact support for help and temporary lock features.

question: What is self-exclusion and how does it work?
answer: Self-exclusion blocks access for a chosen period (e.g., 6 months, 1 year). During exclusion you can't log in or create new accounts. Contact support to set or lift exclusions after expiry.

question: I think my account was hacked — what do I do?
answer: Change your password immediately, enable 2FA if available, and contact support with details. Do not share sensitive info via public channels.

question: How can I enable two-factor authentication (2FA)?
answer: In Account Settings → Security, enable 2FA and link with an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy). Store backup codes safely.

question: Why can't I log in — account locked?
answer: Multiple failed attempts may lock your account temporarily. Use password reset or contact support for unlock after identity verification.

question: How do I report suspicious activity or a scam?
answer: Collect evidence (screenshots, emails) and submit a support ticket marked 'Fraud' or 'Security'. The security team will investigate and advise next steps.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: Use Live Chat (if available), Email, or Submit a Ticket from the Contact/Help page. Response times vary by channel; live chat is fastest.

question: What are the support hours?
answer: Many platforms offer 24/7 support, but email response can take longer. Check the Support page for exact hours and channels.

question: How do I upload KYC documents?
answer: Go to Profile → Verification → Upload Documents. Choose file, attach, and submit. Wait for the verification confirmation email.

question: My documents were rejected — why?
answer: Common reasons: blurry images, cropped edges, expired ID, mismatch with account details. Re-scan with clear lighting and submit the correct documents.

question: How to add or update card details securely?
answer: Add card details in Cashier → Payment Methods. Never share full card numbers in chat. If required, provide last 4 digits for verification only.

question: Can I deposit with crypto?
answer: If the platform supports crypto, go to Cashier → Crypto, choose coin (BTC, ETH, etc.), copy deposit address or scan QR, and send from your wallet. Include correct network and memo if required.

question: What is a transaction ID and where do I find it?
answer: A transaction ID is provided by your payment provider or blockchain; it proves the transfer. Provide it in support tickets to speed investigation.

question: How do I cancel a pending withdrawal?
answer: Some platforms allow cancellation in Cashier → Withdrawals (if status is 'Pending'). If not, contact support immediately for assistance.

question: Why was my withdrawal rejected?
answer: Rejected withdrawals occur due to failed verification, mismatched details, or payment provider declines. Check rejection reason and resolve any KYC or details issues.

question: Can I request a partial withdrawal?
answer: Yes, you can usually withdraw any amount between min/max limits. Partial withdrawals may be subject to min withdrawal amounts and fees.

question: Are there fees for deposits or withdrawals?
answer: Fees depend on the payment provider. The platform may display fees in Cashier. If unsure, check Payment Terms or contact support.

question: How do I change my phone number?
answer: In Account Settings → Contact Details, request phone update. For security you may need to verify the new number via SMS or provide ID.

question: How do I report a bug or technical issue?
answer: Provide a detailed description, device and browser info, screenshots, and exact time of occurrence in a support ticket so the tech team can reproduce and fix it.

question: Why is a game not loading on my device?
answer: Try clearing browser cache, disabling ad blockers, updating the browser or app, or switching devices. If issue persists, submit device/browser logs to support.

question: Which browsers or devices are supported?
answer: Modern browsers (Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari) and up-to-date mobile OS versions are supported. Use latest browser version for best experience.

question: How do I enable pop-ups or allow cookies for the site?
answer: Follow your browser settings to enable cookies for the domain and allow pop-ups for payment/verification pages if needed.

question: How do free spins and bonuses work?
answer: Free spins are awarded per promotion and have wagering and game restrictions. Check the promotion terms for eligible games, wagering, and expiry.

question: Why is my bonus locked or unavailable?
answer: Bonuses can be locked due to pending verification, restricted payment methods, or contravention of T&Cs. Contact support with the bonus reference.

question: How do I check my wagering progress?
answer: Visit Promotions or Bonus Status page where your wagering (playthrough) progress is displayed showing remaining amount to wager.

question: How do I use a promo code after deposit?
answer: Promo codes usually must be entered at deposit or claim page. If omitted, contact support quickly — sometimes codes can be applied manually within a limited time.

question: What is the minimum deposit and withdrawal amount?
answer: Minimum amounts vary by currency and method — check Cashier for exact min/max values for each payment type.

question: Why was my bonus contribution different for a game?
answer: Each game has a contribution percentage (e.g., slots 100%, roulette 10%). Check the contribution table in the bonus T&Cs.

question: How do I see my transaction history?
answer: Go to Account → Transactions or Cashier → History. You can filter by deposits, withdrawals, and bets.

question: My balance is different than expected — why?
answer: Pending bets, unsettled games, bonus holds, or pending withdrawals can affect available balance. Check transaction and bonus statuses.

question: How do I report incorrect bet settlement?
answer: Provide bet ID, time, event details, and supporting screenshots in a support ticket for settlement review.

question: How long are promotions valid?
answer: Promo expiry varies — see the promotion terms for start and end dates and expiry after activation.

question: How do I check if I'm eligible for VIP or loyalty rewards?
answer: VIP eligibility is usually based on wagering volume or invitation. Check the Loyalty/VIP page or contact support for status.

question: How do referrals work and how do I track referral rewards?
answer: Share your referral link; when referred users register and meet conditions you earn rewards. Track referrals in the Referral/Account section.

question: How can I appeal a decision or dispute?
answer: Open a support ticket labeled 'Dispute' with all evidence. The complaints team will review and respond with the outcome and escalation options.

question: What happens if I win but can't withdraw due to country restrictions?
answer: Some jurisdictions restrict payouts. If restricted, you may be unable to withdraw — contact support to discuss alternatives or account closure.

question: How does responsible gaming blocking affect my account?
answer: During a responsible gaming block you cannot deposit or play. Withdrawals may still be processed depending on policy.

question: How do I change my account language?
answer: Change language in site footer or Account Settings. If missing, contact support for assistance.

question: I lost access to my authenticator app — how to recover 2FA?
answer: Contact support and follow their 2FA recovery process — this usually requires identity verification and sometimes a waiting period.

question: How do I upload proof of address?
answer: Upload a recent utility bill or bank statement (max 3 months) showing your name and address in the verification section.

question: Can I combine funds across accounts or wallets?
answer: Most platforms do not allow combining separate accounts. You can transfer between wallet sections if the platform supports it (e.g., Casino → Sports transfer).

question: How do I transfer funds between product wallets (casino, sports)?
answer: Use the Wallet Transfer or Move Funds function in Cashier to transfer between product wallets instantly if supported.

question: Why did I receive an email about suspicious login?
answer: The system detected unusual activity or a login from a new device. Change your password, enable 2FA, and contact support if you did not sign in.

question: How can I appeal a blocked account or restriction?
answer: File an appeal via support with evidence and reason. The review team investigates and informs you about next steps after verification.

question: How do I change my currency for payouts?
answer: Currency changes are usually not allowed after registration. Contact support for exceptions; be aware of currency conversion and bonus impacts.

question: Why is my bonus wagering much higher than expected?
answer: You may be seeing combined wagering requirements (deposit + bonus). Re-check T&Cs to confirm the exact wagering basis.

question: How are progressive jackpot payouts handled?
answer: Progressive jackpots follow special rules and are paid out per the jackpot's terms. Contact support for payout schedules and tax info.

question: What happens to my funds if the platform closes?
answer: In such cases, funds are handled per company policy and local law. Keep records and contact support for official guidance.

question: Can I request a refund for a purchase or deposit?
answer: Refunds are subject to payment provider rules and platform policy. Contact support with reasons and receipts; each case is reviewed individually.

question: How do I change the display currency in the UI?
answer: In settings or the cashier you may be able to change display currency. Actual account currency changes usually require support and may have restrictions.

question: Why can't I use a certain payment provider?
answer: Some providers are unavailable in specific countries or for certain account verification statuses. Check Cashier for allowed methods for your country.

question: How are chargebacks handled?
answer: Chargebacks can lead to account suspension and investigations. Support will contact you for details; chargebacks may forfeit funds if fraudulent.

question: How to get a transaction receipt for my deposit/withdrawal?
answer: Download receipts in Transaction History or request one via a support ticket including the transaction ID and date.

question: How do I check my account balance including bonus funds?
answer: Balance view usually shows Available Balance and Bonus Balance separately in the account header or cashier.

question: What is delayed settlement and why did it happen?
answer: Delayed settlement occurs when an event result is pending or under review. Support can provide status once official result is confirmed.

question: How do I report a suspected unfair game result?
answer: Submit game ID, timestamp and screenshots to support; the fairness team will audit game logs and provide findings.

question: How do tournaments and leaderboards work?
answer: Tournaments have set entry rules, buy-ins and prize pools. Visit the Tournament page for rules and leaderboard standings.

question: How do I opt into marketing emails or opt out?
answer: Change preferences in Account Settings → Communication Preferences, or click unsubscribe in marketing emails.

question: How do I request transaction details for auditing?
answer: Submit a support ticket requesting transaction logs; include date range and reason for audit and the team will provide available records.

question: Can I set session timeout or stay logged in?
answer: Session timeout is set by the platform for security. Some sites offer 'Remember me' options; avoid on shared devices.

question: What if I see an error code during payment?
answer: Note the exact error code and contact support with the code and transaction details. Payment providers sometimes return specific codes useful for troubleshooting.

question: How can I get help in another language?
answer: Check Language options in the footer or Contact page for local support. Some sites offer multi-lingual support or translation requests.

question: How do I contest a withheld bonus or funds?
answer: Open a support ticket with evidence and argue your case. The compliance team investigates whether T&Cs or policy were violated.

question: What is provably fair (for crypto games)?
answer: Provably fair uses cryptographic methods to allow players to verify game fairness. Check the game's provably fair page for verification steps.

question: How do I change my address on file?
answer: Update address in Profile or send a support ticket with proof of new address (utility bill or bank statement) for verification.

question: Can I restrict my account to play only certain games?
answer: Some platforms allow self-restrictions or content blocking in responsible gaming settings or via support.

question: How do I get VIP support or faster withdrawals?
answer: VIP status is usually by invitation or based on wagering. Contact support to discuss VIP tiers and benefits.

question: My deposit was charged twice — what now?
answer: Provide bank/card statements and transaction IDs in a ticket. The team will reconcile and refund any duplicate charges if verified.

question: How to check minimum bet and maximum bet for a game?
answer: Bet limits are displayed in the game info/rules. For tournaments or special events check the event rules.

question: Why can't I use bonuses with certain games?
answer: Bonuses often have game restrictions; check the bonus T&Cs to see excluded games or categories.

question: How do I export my betting history or statements?
answer: Use Transaction/Account History export tools if available, or request a statement via support.

question: How do I change deposit currency after making deposits?
answer: Currency conversions after deposits depend on policy. Contact support to discuss options and conversion rates/fees.

question: What do I do if I forgot my username?
answer: Use the password reset or contact support providing your registered email and verification to recover account details.

question: How to request faster verification?
answer: Ensure you submit clear documents in the requested formats. Contact support and mark the ticket 'Urgent' if you have time-sensitive withdrawals.

question: How do I check site maintenance or outages?
answer: Check the Status or Announcements page, follow official social channels, or check the site banner for maintenance updates.

question: How do I test API or integration (for partners)?
answer: Developers should use sandbox/test environment credentials and follow the API docs. Contact Partner/Integration support for access.

question: How do I enable or disable marketing offers?
answer: Manage preferences in Account Settings → Communications, or opt out via marketing emails.

question: How do I set spending alerts?
answer: Set alerts in Responsible Gaming or Account Settings to receive notifications when you reach deposit or loss thresholds.

question: How do I report affiliate / referral payment issues?
answer: Provide referral link, transactions and dates to Affiliate Support who will audit and respond with payment schedules.

question: How can I see a sample of common questions for testing the bot?
answer: Use the 'Sample Questions' panel on the demo page — click any question to auto-fill and send it to the bot for instant testing.

question: How do I change my billing or invoice details?
answer: For corporate or VIP accounts contact Billing support with required billing info and documents for invoice generation.
